mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sm.menu_id AS menuId, sm.menu_name AS menuName, sm.menu_parent_id AS menuParentId, sm.sort_order AS sortOrder, sm.url AS url FROM sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sm.menu_id = srm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON srm.role_id = sur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON sur.user_id = su.id WHERE su.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY sm.group_id ASC, sm.sort_order ASC
SELECT s.menu_id AS id, s.menu_name AS name, s.menu_parent_id AS pId FROM sys_menu s ORDER BY s.group_id ASC, s.sort_order ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET url = CASE url WHEN '/druid/index.html' THEN CONCAT(#{prefix, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '/druid/index.html') WHEN '/swagger-ui.html' THEN CONCAT(#{prefix, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '/swagger-ui.html') WHEN '/hystrix' THEN CONCAT(#{prefix, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '/hystrix') END WHERE url IN('/druid/index.html', '/swagger-ui.html', '/hystrix')
